text: The Kyaw River () is a river of upper Burma (Myanmar) in Magway Division., , United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency It is a major tributary of the Yaw River which it enters just below the town of Pauk.Hunter, William Wilson (editor) (1907) Imperial gazetteer of India (2nd edition) Clarendon Press, Oxford, England, page 77, ==Notes and references== ==See also== *List of rivers of Burma Category:Rivers of Myanmar
title: Kyaw River
